page.title: 02The Rector in Halstead
page.content: Our{rector}is called Mr Bury .He lives in Halstead but he looks after two churches.{St Katharine's}in Knockholt and{St Margaret's}in Halstead. He says he has the{best job {in the world. His most important duty is to pray for all the people in the two villages. No one tells him what to do so he has to decide for himself where he is most needed. He has to do a lot of travelling because sick people are sent to many different hospitals in the area. He also visits sad, bereaved people because they feel very sick inside and need special care. Mr Bury is responsible for the {Church of England School in Knockholt. He visits our school to tell us about God.{Our rector is a very busy man.
